DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare vaginal progesterone supplementation cervical cerclage prevention preterm labor woman short cervical length history previous midtrimester miscarriage and/or preterm labor .
DOC.brief_title: Vaginal Progesterone Versus Cervical Cerclage Pregnant Women With Short Cervix History PTL and/or MTM
DOC.detailed_description: Women singleton pregnancy history preterm labor and/or midtrimester miscarriage previous pregnancy select serial assessment cervical length transvaginal sonography ( TVS ) start 16 week till 24 week gestation . Eligible participant study cervical length 15-25 mm 16-24 week gestation . At 16-24 week gestational age , woman participate study randomly allocate two group ; progesterone group cerclage group . For woman progesterone group , vaginal progesterone suppository give dose 400 mg/day . For woman cerclage group , McDonald cervical cerclage perform .
DOC.criteria: Women singleton pregnancy . History preterm labor and/or midtrimester miscarriage previous pregnancy . Cervical length 1525 mm transvaginal sonography ( TVS ) 1624 week gestation . Age < 20 > 35 year . Congenital uterine malformation . Multifetal pregnancy . Known major fetal structural chromosomal abnormality . Known allergy contraindication ( relative absolute ) progesterone therapy . Presence contraindication cervical cerclage . Medical condition complicate pregnancy . Vaginal bleeding .
